query:
SELECT 
  ta.accountNumber,
  COUNT(t.id) as total_trades,
  MAX(t.createdAt) as last_trade
FROM trading_accounts ta
LEFT JOIN trades t ON ta.id = t.accountId
WHERE ta.userId = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'adm1@sentra.com')
GROUP BY ta.id, ta.accountNumber
ORDER BY last_trade DESC;

  ta.accountNumber,
  COUNT(t.id) as total_trades,
  MAX(t.createdAt) as last_trade
FROM trading_accounts ta
LEFT JOIN trades t ON ta.id = t.accountId
WHERE ta.userId = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'adm1@sentra.com')
GROUP BY ta.id, ta.accountNumber
ORDER BY last_trade DESC;
